response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it holds significant value for those who appreciate exceptional products. Considering the investment made into its development and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $18,000. We are confident that this price reflects the true value and potential impact of our product on your endeavors. Should you decide to proceed with this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
